Presenting, the Profile Overhaul: 介绍：配置文件功能重大更新
Added more context to some popups: 在一些弹出窗口中新增了更多说明文字。
现在可以为配置文件添加缩略图。

V3.2 版本的稳定版本更新。
新增筛选作者的下拉列表。
新增“加载顺序”排序选项。
将鼠标指针悬停在图标上面，以显示评分与订阅量。
配置文件用途现在有单独的图标。
新增在插件名称旁边显示小标签的功能。
更改了配置文件列表的设计。
Fixed private packages being marked as .
Local mods' name & label have been updat: 已更新本地模组的名称和标签。
Added Compatibility Report for broken As: 新增已损坏资产的兼容性报告
You can now assign a color to your profi: 现在您可以自定义配置文件图标的颜色了。
Added a Sorting dropdown & sort order to: 新增排序方式下拉列表，和切换排序顺序的功能。
Added 2 new buttons in the Help & Logs p: 在获取帮助与日志页面，新增了两个按钮。
Fixed playsets disappearing on macOS & L: 修复了 macOS 和 Linux 上配置文件消失的问题。
Updated the UI of the file selection scr: 更新了文件选择窗口的界面。
Fixed the log file path being wrong on L: 修复 Linux 系统上日志文件路径错误的问题。
The Compatibility Report tab is now avai: 兼容性报告页面现在已更新，可以使用。
Fixed the profile list not updating inst: 修复了配置文件列表没有立即更新的问题。
Fixed an error while fetching steam user: 修复了获取 Steam 用户信息出错的问题。
Added an indicator that a profile is upl: 新增配置文件正在上传的指示标志。
Fixed Profiles' Auto-Save not working co: 修复了无法自动保存配置文件的问题。
Added 6 new reset buttons in the Utiliti: 在实用工具页面新增了 6 个重置按钮。
Fixed freezes happening in the content l: 修复了内容列表页面卡住的问题。
Added more actions to labels in the cont: 为内容列表页面的筛选标签新增了更多操作。
Fixed author pages not opening correctly: 修复了无法正确地在 Steam 中打开作者主页的问题。
Fixed the out of date status not working: 修复了检查插件是否已过期功能没有正常工作的问题。
Fixed DLCs not being applied when loadin: 修复了加载配置文件时，没有应用 DLC 的配置的问题。
Search in the content list pages is now: 现在在内容列表页面中，搜索的响应速度要比之前快得多了。
Added 'Votes' & 'Total Subscribers' sort: 新增“评分”和“订阅量”的排序选项。
Fixed the options tab not opening for ma: 修复了 MacOS 和 Linux 系统上选项页面无法打开的问题。
Fixed the changelog not opening with som: 修复了选择了某些语言时，更新日志无法打开的问题。
'Profiles' are now, appropriately, calle: “配置文件”的英文名由 'Profile' 改为 'Playset'，更加恰当了。
Swapped all double-buttons and option to: Swapped all double-buttons and option toggles' sides.
Fixed mods being detected in the local a: 修复了在本地资产文件夹内检测到模组的问题。
Fixed the asset summary not showing in t: 修复了统计面板的资产概要没有显示的问题。
Fixed the language option being empty fo: 修复了某些玩家语言选项为空的问题。
Improved the responsiveness of the conte: 提高了内容列表页面中程序的响应能力。
Fixed updating an online profile not wor: 修复了更新在线配置文件的功能无法正常工作的问题。
Ctrl+Click on an author's name to add it: Ctrl+Click on an author's name to add it to your filter
Added Pinned folders to easily access re: 新增置顶文件夹，便于快速打开相关文件夹。
Fixed profile packages not showing their: Fixed profile packages not showing their workshop name.
Improved the performance for people with: 提升了拥有大量模组时软件的性能。
Added an option to ignore internet conne: 新增跳过网络连接检查的选项。
Fixed a bug that caused infinite loading: 修复了导致某些玩家无限加载的错误。
You can now create a desktop shortcut fo: 现在，您可以为不同的配置文件分别创建桌面快捷方式了。
Animations are now disabled by default o: 现在 macOS 和 Linux 系统上默认禁用动画效果。
Improved performance while including/exc: 提高了装载/卸下插件时的性能。
Added a button to view a Profile's file: 新增了一个按钮，便于打开配置文件存储文件夹目录。
You can now subscribe to packages while: 现在在游戏运行期间，您也可以使用 Skyve 订阅插件。
Unlisted packages now have the correct n: Unlisted packages now have the correct name and thumbnail.
Simplify a log file to focus on what's a: 将日志文件简化，以便专注于解决关键问题。
Removed the subscription tab from the in: 移除了游戏内置的订阅功能。
Added a custom arguments box for advance: 为开发者启动选项新增自定义启动参数的功能。
Updated the color design of the app's lo: Updated the color design of the app's logo on the top-left.
Fixed and improved the speed of Loading: 修复并提高打开 Loading Screen Mod Revisited 资产报告的速度。
Compatibility Report is now integrated d: 现在 Compatibility Report 模组已被整合到 Skyve 中。
Added a button to easily view an online: 新增了一个按钮，可以轻松查看在线配置文件的内容。
Added an 'Unsubscribe All' button in con: 在内容页面中新增“全部取消订阅”的操作选项。
Added a loading animation when viewing a: 新增在查看配置文件的内容时的加载动画。
Click-to-filter now uses the Alt key ins: Click-to-filter now uses the Alt key instead of the Ctrl key.
Fixed Linux & Mac users not being able t: 修复了 Linux 和 Mac 用户无法生成日志压缩包的问题。
Quickly view errors in your most recent/: 快速查看您最近/当前游戏中的报错信息。
Added a Ctrl+[0-9] shortcut to switch be: 现在可以按住 Ctrl 键 + [0-9] 数字键，来快速切换到左侧菜单上的不同页面。
So many more UI improvements, changes, a: 界面的改进、功能的变更，以及修复的问题，多到我都数不清了。
Click on the icon for an in-depth descri: 点击图标可深入了解相关功能。
Added a \"Force download\" option in pac: 新增功能：右键点击一个插件时，可以“强制下载”此插件。
Sorting & Grid-view settings are now sav: 排序和网格视图到设置现在按照每个页面来保存。
Placeholders for folder settings now cor: 在设置文件夹时，预显示的占位符现在可以正确跟随您的操作系统。
Fixed the LHT option not working when la: 修复了在进入新地图时，靠左行驶选项不起作用的问题。
Fixed a rare case where the compatibilit: 修复了兼容性信息无法加载的罕见问题。
You can now upload a profile online, up: 您现在可以将配置文件上传到在线服务器，每个用户最多可上传 5 个配置文件。
Added a setting in-game to enable hot-re: Added a setting in-game to enable hot-reload for mods & assets.
Fixed the current playset's name staying: Fixed the current playset's name staying visible while in-game.
You can now import a LOT 1 profile in th: You can now import a LOT 1 profile in the 'Add Profile' section.
Your Paradox account panel will always b: Your Paradox account panel will always be displayed from now on.
Partially included packages now have a d: Partially included packages now have a different UI in the list.
Added a Workshop section to easily selec: Added a Workshop section to easily select workshop maps & saves.
Packages you are not subscribed to are n: Packages you are not subscribed to are no longer loaded in-game.
Fixed legacy profiles not being converte: Fixed legacy profiles not being converted after the first launch.
Fixed 'Real' folders being swapped on sa: Fixed 'Real' folders being swapped on save for Linux & Mac users.
Fixed some parts of the UI not getting t: Fixed some parts of the UI not getting translated from the start.
Added an option to have Filters & Action: Added an option to have Filters & Action sections open by default.
Adding an info popup when subscribing to: Adding an info popup when subscribing to items for the first time.
Changed the design of the top action but: Changed the design of the top action buttons on both profile pages
Fixed Asset Editor launch settings not b: Fixed Asset Editor launch settings not being remembered correctly.
Recommendations and info text are now cl: Recommendations and info text are now clearer and easier to manage.
Added \"View this Profile's contents\" i: Added "View this Profile's contents" in profiles' right-click menu.
Fixed custom maps not loading when selec: Fixed custom maps not loading when selected in the profile settings.
Loosened the sensitivity of the 'Partial: Loosened the sensitivity of the 'Partially Downloaded' notification.
Added a \"Download all displayed items\": Added a "Download all displayed items" in the actions in list pages.
Added an option to hide the current play: Added an option to hide the current playset's name in the main menu.
Fixed the Help & Logs tab not loading yo: Fixed the Help & Logs tab not loading your current log automatically.
The core systems of Skyve have been chan: The core systems of Skyve have been changed, organised, and optimised.
Added a Utility section to subscribe to: Added a Utility section to subscribe to missing items in a BOB config.
Fixed loading Profiles on macOS & Linux: Fixed loading Profiles on macOS & Linux not always applying correctly.
Fixed loading a collection URL sometimes: Fixed loading a collection URL sometimes not parsing the ID correctly.
Added a Snooze button to dismiss a certa: Added a Snooze button to dismiss a certain compatibility notification.
Your current playset's name is now displ: Your current playset's name is now displayed in the main menu in-game.
Fixed local assets not automatically ref: Fixed local assets not automatically refreshing after external changes.
You can now generate a zip file of your: You can now generate a zip file of your logs while the game is running.
Added an option to disable the automatic: Added an option to disable the automatic cleanup when opening the game.
Local assets are now correctly groupped: Local assets are now correctly groupped based on the folders they're in.
You can discover online profiles using a: You can discover online profiles using a new button in the Profiles tab.
Compatibility & package statuses are now: Compatibility & package statuses are now shown on the right in the list.
Fixed the incorrect names of packages wh: Fixed the incorrect names of packages while viewing a playset's contents.
Moved the 'Actions' section in the conte: Moved the 'Actions' section in the content pages and added 2 new options.
Improved the Actions button to make it m: Improved the Actions button to make it more visible and easier to access.
Deletions by Skyve will now send the fil: Deletions by Skyve will now send the files to the recycle bin on Windows.
Added an 'Open File' option to the right: Added an 'Open File' option to the right-click menu when selecting a file.
Re-downloading from steam will no longer: Re-downloading from steam will no longer force the focus back to the tool.
Added new Profile usages: Map Creation,: Added new Profile usages: Map Creation, Scenario Making, and Theme Making.
Fixed previous settings and profiles som: Fixed previous settings and profiles sometimes not carrying over to Skyve.
Added a message to let you know when 'Fi: Added a message to let you know when 'Fix All Issues' & 'Run Cleanup' end.
Fixed a rare bug where loading a LOT 1 p: Fixed a rare bug where loading a LOT 1 profile would keep loading forever.
Fixed converting LOT 1 profiles resultin: Fixed converting LOT 1 profiles resulting in assets being marked as 'Local'
Changed the icons of filters to reflect: Changed the icons of filters to reflect the correct icons used in the list.
Copy all IDs action now includes package: Copy all IDs action now includes packages' names and local packages as well.
Share a zip file containing all the logs: Share a zip file containing all the logs needed for someone to help you out.
The window buttons on the top right now: The window buttons on the top right now have icons to explain their actions.
Required items automatically redirect to: Required items automatically redirect to the packages' most recent successor.
Potentially fixed subscribing to a large: Potentially fixed subscribing to a large amount of items failing/not working.
Online profiles can be downloaded, or up: Online profiles can be downloaded, or updated if you already have it locally.
Fixed the map selection for a new game n: Fixed the map selection for a new game not letting users select a vanilla map.
Fixed not being able to use Workshop map: Fixed not being able to use Workshop maps & save-games in the profile settings
If your profile has un-saved changes, th: If your profile has un-saved changes, the Skyve logo will now light up purple.
Fixed LOT becoming unresponsive on Mac/L: Fixed LOT becoming unresponsive on Mac/Linux when unsubscribing from a package.
Enabled the ability to request a review: Enabled the ability to request a review for a package that is currently broken.
Required mods now have a different UI to: Required mods now have a different UI to let you know you can not exclude them.
Added in the Utilities page an import fr: Added in the Utilities page an import from any text file or from your clipboard.
Added a sorting order switch to select b: Added a sorting order switch to select between Ascending and Descending sorting.
Broken, incompatible, and banned package: Broken, incompatible, and banned packages now have a new background in the list.
Updated the Package Page to match the di: Updated the Package Page to match the displayed information in the content lists.
Re-filtering using the shortcuts in the: Re-filtering using the shortcuts in the list now removes the item from your filter.
Uploaded profiles can be private, shared: Uploaded profiles can be private, shared with an ID, or public for everyone to see.
You can now select multiple items in the: You can now select multiple items in the content lists using the Ctrl or Shift keys.
Added links to the package page, as well: Added links to the package page, as well as other information like its usage & type.
Profiles list now uses a Grid View, and: Profiles list now uses a Grid View, and you can toggle between the grid & list view.
Improved the author info gathering, whic: Improved the author info gathering, which will fix the issue of authors not loading.
Added a warning text in the dashboard wh: Added a warning text in the dashboard when you have multiple LOM instances installed.
Improved the performance of the app. Qui: Improved the performance of the app. Quicker load times & less stutters are expected.
Local & Vanilla packages are now correct: Local & Vanilla packages are now correctly matched while viewing a playset's contents.
Favorite Profiles are now shown on your: Favorite Profiles are now shown on your dashboard to allow easy switching between them.
A shortcut will now be created when you: A shortcut will now be created when you first open Skyve after you previously had LOM2.
Missing source code will now generate a: Missing source code will now generate a warning instead of an unsubscribe notification.
Excluded mods no longer use the '.exclud: Excluded mods no longer use the '.excluded' file, they instead use a new ModConfig file.
Fixed the text in the import collection: Fixed the text in the import collection for subscribing and unsubscribing being flipped.
Added a new \"Any Issues\" option for \": Added a new "Any Issues" option for "Package Status" & "Compatibility Report" dropdowns.
Fixed freezes happening while searching: Fixed freezes happening while searching while the 'Subscribe Time' sorting was selected.
Added a third option in the 'Add Profile: Added a third option in the 'Add Profile' page to import an online profile using its ID.
Fixed authors and tags filter not refres: Fixed authors and tags filter not refreshing if you enter the page before they've loaded.
Added a \"References\" tab on a package': Added a "References" tab on a package's page to see all other packages that reference it.
Added an option to make optional package: Added an option to make optional packages use the same notification as required packages.
Added language dialects, Chinese Traditi: Added language dialects, Chinese Traditional (Taiwan), English UK, and Portuguese Brazil.
Fixed downloading or updating a profile: Fixed downloading or updating a profile not properly saving some data like the thumbnail.
Implemented a new icon system that scale: Implemented a new icon system that scales all of the icons appropriately to your UI scale.
Added the search, filter & sorting tools: Added the search, filter & sorting tools to lists in authors' page & in the packages' page.
Steam links will now open inside of Stea: Steam links will now open inside of Steam's window. This can be toggled off in the Options.
All filter actions are now done using Ct: All filter actions are now done using Ctrl+Click, added an option to swap this functionality.
The required items displayed on a worksh: The required items displayed on a workshop asset's page is now integrated in Load Order Tool.
BOB import is now a generic XML import b: BOB import is now a generic XML import by supporting any XML format that contains package IDs.
Added change-log pages, you'll see it on: Added change-log pages, you'll see it on new versions or using its button in the Help sections.
Added extra text in the list to show how: Added extra text in the list to show how many packages are hidden because of your profile usage.
Fixed packages' steam info not loading f: Fixed packages' steam info not loading from the first time when viewing a profile or collection.
'Show Folder Settings' now automatically: 'Show Folder Settings' now automatically be turned on if one of the folder settings is incorrect.
Added right-click actions in the content: Added right-click actions in the content list to exclude or include an item in all your packages.
Added new functionalities to easily hand: Added new functionalities to easily handle mismatches between Steam and your downloaded packages.
Re-downloading Load Order Tool will init: Re-downloading Load Order Tool will initiate the download and close the app while it gets updated.
Fixed deleting local assets from the rig: Fixed deleting local assets from the right-click menu deleting all local assets instead of just one
Added new Profile sorting options. The s: Added new Profile sorting options. The selected sorting will now be remembered throughout sessions.
Steam panels in the main menu are now sh: Steam panels in the main menu are now shown by default, you can still hide them in the mod settings.
Local mods' name has been reverted to th: Local mods' name has been reverted to the folder name instead of the Workshop one to prevent issues.
Added 'New Asset' & 'Load Asset' launch: Added 'New Asset' & 'Load Asset' launch options in the profile to quickly load into the Asset Editor.
Added a box at the bottom left of the ap: Added a box at the bottom left of the app to let you know of any pending subscribe/unsubscribe tasks.
Improved the 'Add Tags' window; you can: Improved the 'Add Tags' window; you can easily select from existing tags & edit multiple items at once.
You can now edit Find it! tags directly: You can now edit Find it! tags directly in the app to mods and assets. Assets are synched with the game.
Pseudo-mods now include IMT Markings, Re: Pseudo-mods now include IMT Markings, Render it! Presets, Procedural Objects Fonts, and translation mods.
Reworked the rendering of lists, improvi: Reworked the rendering of lists, improving the performance and responsiveness of content pages drastically.
You can now request a review for a packa: You can now request a review for a package to notify us about missing information in the compatibility data.
Fixed an interaction between similar mod: Fixed an interaction between similar mods showing in the Compatibility Report when you only have one of them.
Subscribing to multiple items in a row w: Subscribing to multiple items in a row will put them in a pending list instead of opening the game each time.
The 'Profiles' tab in the sidebar will n: The 'Profiles' tab in the sidebar will now open your profiles list instead of your current profile's settings.
This information will now be included in: This information will now be included in the Compatibility Report to quickly and easily see what you're missing.
Added the 'Other Profiles' section in a: Added the 'Other Profiles' section in a package's page to easily exclude or include them from your other profiles
Fixed launching LOT after the monitor it: Fixed launching LOT after the monitor it was previously on got turned off resulting in the window now showing up.
Presenting, Skyve, the final successor o:
Presenting, Skyve, the final successor of Load Order Mod 1/2 and Compatibility Report.
Coming for C:S I & C:S II
The 'First time setup incomplete' screen: The 'First time setup incomplete' screen now has an ignore button to manually set up your folder settings instead.
Added a new icon next to a package that: Added a new icon next to a package that displays a quick summary of the votes and subscriber count of the package.
Reduced the report level of a mod that h: Reduced the report level of a mod that hasn't been updated in a while to 'Info' so it doesn't notify you about it.
Improved the buttons and filter controls: Improved the buttons and filter controls in content lists, reducing their overall size, and adding more visual cues.
Added a troubleshooting system to the Ut: Added a troubleshooting system to the Utilities tab; use it to narrow down what mod or asset is causing your issues.
Added a button in the Utilities tab to m: Added a button in the Utilities tab to manually run this cleanup as well as forcing the download of missing packages.
The troubleshooting system will provide: The troubleshooting system will provide you with a guided, step by step, way of finding what mod or asset is at fault.
Your current playset's name is now displ:
Your current playset's name is now displayed in the main menu in-game.
*This can be disabled in the in-game settings.
Mod loading is now cached; resulting in: Mod loading is now cached; resulting in more efficient loads on Windows & Linux, as well as much faster loads on macOS.
Added an advanced option to force the do: Added an advanced option to force the download or delete of packages as soon as you subscribe/unsubscribe to them in Skyve.
Added a troubleshooting system to the Ut: Added a troubleshooting system to the Utilities & Help tabs; use it to narrow down what mod or asset is causing your issues.
Added a grid-view option for all content: Added a grid-view option for all content pages; toggle between list & grid view using the new icons on the top right of the list.
Mod & Asset creators can now edit their: Mod & Asset creators can now edit their packages' Compatibility Data; just right-click the package and select 'Edit Compatibility'.
Having a custom location for LSMR report: Having a custom location for LSMR report files will now correctly start from there when selecting a report file in the Utilities page.
Newly subscribed items are no longer rel:
Newly subscribed items are no longer reloaded while the game is open.
Doing so prevents freezes of your game as well as mods malfunctioning.
Added a compact-view option for all cont: Added a compact-view option for all content pages; toggle between compact, list & grid view using the new icons on the top right of the list.
Launching the game while LOT is open wil: 当您打开 LOT2 并启动游戏时，会自动删除您已经取消订阅（但没删除干净）的插件。
Requesting a review now requires a valid: Requesting a review now requires a valid description and also sends your logs with the request. A disclaimer is shown next to the 'Send' button.
Added a new User Profile page, accessed: Added a new User Profile page, accessed by clicking on the author of a mod or profile. This page includes all of the user's profiles & packages.
Once started, you can safely close Skyve: Once started, you can safely close Skyve and continue at a later date. Skyve will remember all your settings and what stage you are currently on.
The Load Order of mods has been re-integ: The Load Order of mods has been re-integrated, and is completely automated based on mods' requirements as well as other Compatibility-Report factors.
Added grid-view & compact-view options f: 在所有内容页面中，新增“网格视图”和“紧凑视图”选项； 使用内容列表右上角的新图标，即可切换紧凑/列表/网格视图。
Local packages are automatically matched: 现在本地插件会自动与其对应的工坊插件匹配，显示来自 Steam 创意工坊的插件信息，并正确显示其兼容性信息。
When starting the procedure, Skyve will: When starting the procedure, Skyve will save your current settings and then start excluding or including packages automatically until you can find the cause of your issues.
Secondary content lists like 'Missing Pa: 现在，例如“缺失的插件”和“创意工坊合集”等二级内容页面，其用户界面的设计与一级页面（内容列表主页面）相同，可以给用户提供流线型体验，并提供更多选项。
The new icon now glows based on what's h: Skyve 程序的新图标根据游戏和 Skyve 程序的运行状态发光，蓝色表示游戏正在运行， 红色表示没有网络连接（请打开加速器 / VPN），快速闪烁表示正在启动或关闭游戏。
Changed the option to increase list item: Changed the option to increase list items' size on hover to always increase their size, improved the UI of enlarged list items, and applied this functionality to the rest of the lists in the app.
Separating terms with a comma in your se:
Separating terms with a comma in your search will split your search to match any of the terms (OR)
	• Adding '+' at the start of your term will require the term to be matched (AND)
	• Adding '-' at the start of your term will exclude items that match that term

Examples of the new search:
	• car, truck (matches 'car' OR 'truck')
	• building, apartment +european (matches 'european' AND ['building' OR 'apartment'])
	• condo, house -rico +american (matches 'american' AND ['condo' OR 'house'] AND NOT 'rico')
